price: 36. ¿Acaso no basta Al-lah para (proteger y ayudar) a Su siervo (Muhammad)? E intentan intimidarte, (¡oh, Muhammad!) con los ídolos que adoran fuera de Al-lah. Y a quien Al-lah extravía (por rechazar la verdad) nadie podrá guiarlo.
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبۡدَهُۥۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alaysa al-lahu bikāfin ʿabdahu wayukhawwifūnaka bi-alladhīna min dūnihi waman yuḍ'lili al-lahu famā lahu min hādin
